description: The vms inventory dashboard displays an inventory list of all vms of the selected data center and cluster.

panels.content: ###### This dashboard displays an inventory list of all virtual machines in the selected cluster.

panels.description: This report displays a inventory list of all virtual machines of the selected data center and cluster.

targets.rawSql:
-- BR9 - This query will return for the specific data center,
-- the latest VMs configurations, grouped by clusters.

SELECT
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.vm_name,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_name,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.template_name,
    a.value AS os_version,
    ROUND ( COALESCE ( cpu_per_socket, 0 ) * COALESCE ( number_of_sockets, 0 ), 0 ) AS vm_cpucores,
    ROUND ( CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0.00 ) AS float ) :: numeric / 1024, 1 ) AS vm_memsize,
    v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date AS cluster_delete,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.create_date AS date ) AS create_date,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date AS date ) AS delete_date
FROM 
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms
    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
        (
           SELECT enum_type, enum_key, value
           FROM enum_translator
           WHERE language_code = 'en_US' AND enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
        )AS a
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.operating_system =
                a.enum_key AND a.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
            )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id =
                v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id
                AND v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.history_id 
                    IN 
                        (
                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                            FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                            GROUP BY a.cluster_id
                        )
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT cluster_id
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters
                WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
            )
    -- Here we filter by the virtual machine/s chosen by the user
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_vms.vm_id IN ($vm_id)
    -- Here we get the latest vm configurations
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_vms.history_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms a
                GROUP BY a.vm_id
            )
        -- Here we get or remove deleted entities according to what the user chose
        -- in the "show_deleted" parameter.
    AND
        CASE
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                THEN 1=1
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date isnull
        END
ORDER BY
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date DESC

panels.title: Virtual Machines Inventory (BR9)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT   CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  CASE          WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    THEN datacenter_name 	 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  		END AS __text  		FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters  		WHERE       		    history_id           			    IN               				(  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		         					GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	         				) 	 			AND datacenter_id  	         			    IN 			     				    ( 					 						SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					 						FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					 						WHERE  					     						    cluster_id 					         						        IN 					             						            ( 									 										SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									 										FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms  								 									) 				 					) 	 			AND 	    			    CASE  	        				    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    THEN 1=1 		    					WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	                END
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT   CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  CASE          WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    THEN datacenter_name 	 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  		END AS __text  		FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters  		WHERE       		    history_id           			    IN               				(  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		         					GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	         				) 	 			AND datacenter_id  	         			    IN 			     				    ( 					 						SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					 						FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					 						WHERE  					     						    cluster_id 					         						        IN 					             						            ( 									 										SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									 										FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms  								 									) 				 					) 	 			AND 	    			    CASE  	        				    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    THEN 1=1 		    					WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	                END

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT        CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  	CASE      	    WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     		    THEN cluster_name 	 		WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      		    THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  	END AS __text  	FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters  	WHERE       	    history_id           		    IN               			    (  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a  		         					GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	         				) 	 		AND cluster_id  	         		    IN 			     			    ( 					 					SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					 					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms 				 				) 	 		AND 	    		    CASE  	        			    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    THEN 1=1 		    				WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        				    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	    			END     		AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT        CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  	CASE      	    WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     		    THEN cluster_name 	 		WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      		    THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  	END AS __text  	FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters  	WHERE       	    history_id           		    IN               			    (  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a  		         					GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	         				) 	 		AND cluster_id  	         		    IN 			     			    ( 					 					SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					 					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms 				 				) 	 		AND 	    		    CASE  	        			    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    THEN 1=1 		    				WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        				    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	    			END     		AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT        CAST ( vm_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  	CASE      	    WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     		    THEN vm_name 	 		WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      		    THEN vm_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  	END AS __text  	FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms  	WHERE       	    history_id           		    IN               			    (  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms a  		         					GROUP BY a.vm_id 	         				) 	 		AND 	    		    CASE  	        			    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    THEN 1=1 		    				WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        				    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date ISNULL 	    			END     		AND cluster_id IN ($cluster_id)
list.label: Virtual Machine
list.name: vm_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT        CAST ( vm_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  	CASE      	    WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     		    THEN vm_name 	 		WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      		    THEN vm_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  	END AS __text  	FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms  	WHERE       	    history_id           		    IN               			    (  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_vms a  		         					GROUP BY a.vm_id 	         				) 	 		AND 	    		    CASE  	        			    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    THEN 1=1 		    				WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        				    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_vms.delete_date ISNULL 	    			END     		AND cluster_id IN ($cluster_id)

title: VMs Inventory Dashboard
